words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; all trans. agree
H413 prep. אֶל + 3mp suff. 'to them'; all trans. agree
H7200 Qal jussive 3ms of רָאָה 'to see, look'; KJV 'the LORD look upon you', ESV 'the LORD look on you', NASB 'may the LORD look upon you'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5921 prep. עַל + 2mp suff. 'upon you'; all trans. agree
H8199 conj. + Qal jussive 3ms of שָׁפַט 'to judge'; KJV 'and judge', ESV 'and judge', NASB 'and judge'
H834 rel. pron./conj. 'who, which, because'; KJV 'because', ESV 'because', NASB 'because'
H887 Hiphil perf. 2mp of בָּאַשׁ 'to stink, become odious'; KJV 'ye have made our savour to be abhorred', ESV 'you have made us stink', NASB 'you have made us odious'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H7381 n.ms + 1cp suff. of רֵיחַ 'scent, odor, reputation'; KJV 'our savour', ESV 'us stink' (paraphrased), NASB 'us odious'; lit. 'our smell/reputation'
H5869 prep. b- + n.fd constr. of עַיִן 'eye'; KJV 'in the eyes of', ESV 'in the sight of', NASB 'in the sight of'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H5869 conj. + prep. b- + n.fd constr. of עַיִן 'eye'; KJV 'and in the eyes of', ESV 'and in the sight of', NASB 'and in the sight of'
H5650 n.mp constr. + 3ms suff. of עֶבֶד 'servant'; KJV 'his servants', ESV 'his servants', NASB 'his servants'
H5414 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. of נָתַן 'to give, put'; KJV 'to put', ESV 'to put', NASB 'to put'
H2719 n.fs חֶרֶב 'sword'; KJV 'a sword', ESV 'a sword', NASB 'a sword'
H3027 prep. b- + n.fs + 3mp suff. of יָד 'hand'; KJV 'in their hand', ESV 'in their hand', NASB 'in their hand'
H2026 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. + 1cp suff. of הָרַג 'to kill, slay'; KJV 'to slay us', ESV 'to kill us', NASB 'to kill us'
